Description: Great shape plays great tons of fret for years No issues with electronics or coil tapping few chips to the tips but nothing deep. no case but will ship in gig bag backplate and handle for Floyd Rose are in the bag these dont pop up too often on eBay so grab it quick please ask any questions. Jackson RRMG Pro Series Rhoads Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance: Compound-radius is perfect for both riffing and soloing Active EMG humbuckers take your tone into the heart of metal territory Through-body maple neck plus a Floyd Rose tailpiece delivers epic sustain and killer bends Compound-radius is perfect for both riffing and soloing The Jackson RRMG Pro Series Rhoads sports a compound-radius rosewood fingerboard with jumbo frets. Down low, your fretting hand will appreciate the 12" radius thet keeps things nice and confortable for natural, relaxed chord work. Up top, a 16" radius lays it all out flat for effortless, low-action high-speed runs with monumental string bends without fretting out. The best of both worlds. Active EMG humbuckers take your tone into the heart of metal territory Easily the most popular pickup combination in modern metal history, the set of EMGs Jackson gave this RRMG Pro Series Rhoads is the perfect recipe for serious shredding tone. An EMG 85 at the neck lets you go effortlessly between glassy cleans to liquid smooth leads, whereas the EMG 81 at the bridge is prefect for bringing out the crunch in your amp and dropping heavy riffs. Together, these pickups make the RRMG a Rhoads worthy of any modern metal guitarist. Through-body maple neck plus a Floyd Rose tailpiece delivers epic sustain and killer bends From headstock to strap button, the Jackson RRMG Pro Series Rhoads is set up for truly phenomenal sustain and awesome bends. First, there's the through-body maple neck, whose extreme hardness keeps your strings humming intensely with every note. What's more, Jackson hooked the RRMG Pro up with a real Floyd Rose tremolo, letting you unleash killer bends as well. Jackson RRMG Pro Series Rhoads Solidbody Electric Guitar Features: A killer Randy Rhoads Jackson guitar made for modern metal players Graphite reinforced 3-piece maple neck-though design provides phenomenal sustain Floyd Rose tremolo tailpiece lets you pull off wicked bends Alder body adds extra resonance and midrange to your sound Active EMG humbuckers (EMG 81 at the bridge, EMG 85 at the neck) deliver quintessential metal tone Compound-radius fretboard makes chord work and soloing
Title: Jackson Pro Series Rhoads RRMG  RR Ebony Fingerboard EMG- Satin Silver
